# Empire Tower (Bangkok)

Empire Tower () is a skyscraper located in Sathon business district, Bangkok, Thailand, adjacent to Sathon Road and Narathiwat Road, close to Chong Nonsi Station (Silom Line of the BTS Skytrain).  Empire Tower 1 is currently the 20th tallest building in Bangkok. It was once the tallest all office building in Thailand.  The Empire Tower 1 has 58 floors and is 227 metres tall.

*List of tallest buildings in Thailand
